We are at a point in our relationship where you should know the truth
The truth is that I was a supremely shy kid, shy as in no friends, when everyone else was in a group, I was always alone with my own thoughts
The truth is that even in middle and high school, while I had more friends than before, I still gravitated to being by myself, creating my own dreams
The truth is that even in college, when everyone around me was super social, I felt like I didn't belong because I felt particularly un-American

The truth is that girl decided that she was living beneath her full potential, that hiding away from shining her light was not doing herself nor society a favor; so, she channeled her insane drive towards transforming her life; she actually made an effort in friendships, relationships, people skills; the super introverted girl actually grew to become really confident through practicing connecting with people

The truth is that I felt alienated from the celebrity pop culture, and I needed to see someone like me in the media who could show young people that an education, an Engineering education, is important
Instead of waiting to see my role model, I decided to become her
Stop hiding and start shining your light my go-getters, you are me
PLANT BLOOD - The Future of Meat
China issued dietary guidelines last year that aim to reduce meat consumption by 50% by 2030. The guidelines seek to improve public health.
A side benefit of this may also be to the environment.
Globally, reports suggest almost 15% of planet-warming emissions come from livestock â€” more, in fact, than the transport sector.
With meat viewed as a dietary hazard and greenhouse gas culprit, it's not surprising to see a host of companies developing meat replacements.
And as these companies catch on, companies such as Tyson Foods, Hormel, Industrias Bachoco, Pilgrim's Pride, and Sanderson Farms, among others, should all be worried.

Among the new hot entrants is Impossible Foods, backed by Bill Gates and Singapore's sovereign wealth fund Temasek. Its meatless burger is said to taste like meat, and it even "bleeds." And it is now rumored to be working on doing for fish what it's done for burgers.
Have you tried vegetarian (plant based) burger? I have and some taste just like meat. So this trend should pick up steam in the coming years.

summary: The greatest life achievement you can strive for is to Create the world around you, so that it matches the dreams in your mind.This is how one of the most advanced economies in the world sprung from the tiny island of Singapore in less than 20 years. How Michael Jordan became the king of basketball. How Armstrong landed on the moon.  And how Elon Musk built Tesla and SpaceX. I approach life with a core belief that anyone can accomplish anything. That not only can one man or woman make a difference, but that itâ€™s one man or woman who often makes the difference.My mission and my purpose is three-fold: to empower those who are committed to living a life by design; to be the absolute best at my craft; and to do all of this while having fun. I have started, built, ran, and sold several successful businesses. My first "business" venture was currency trading at the age of 11 in Albania. It gave me a taste of negotiating deals with "sharks" 4x my age and since then I fell in love with deal making and negotiating. I'm currently working to bring clean solar energy to the world, and to build a successful company by hiring and building successful people.I value freedom, courage, leadership, wisdom, and a good sense of humor. My strength is my commitment to growth. My weakness is Nutella
